name: Resistance is Fruitile
detailed_description:
Resistance is Fruitile is a challenging twin stick shooter jam-packed with sinister fruit monsters and plenty of firepower to take them all on!

THEY STOLE YOUR WEDDING CAKE...

As their wedding ceremony was coming to a close inside of an ancient castle, a legion of fruit monsters suddenly appeared and stole the bride & groom's pure, delicious chocolate wedding cake.

The bride and groom both agree strongly, however, that CHOCOLATE CAKE SHOULD BE FRUIT-FREE, DAMN IT!

Now you must play as the bride, with her powerful shotgun, or the groom, with his long-range pistol, and slaughter every single fruit monster that gets in your way. Hurry before the fruit legion contaminate your precious chocolate cake with their blasphemous fruit juices!

FEATURES



  • High octane twin-stick shooting action!
  • Pixel art fruit obliteration!
  • Bride and groom local co-op!
  • Unique perk cards system!
  • Rockin' soundtrack!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: AMD Athlon II or Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated AMD or Intel graphics, HD 5450 or GT 710
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 or Intel Core i3 (or better)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 460/560 or nVidia GT 1030

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel integrated or better
